title: OpenAI
content: Our work to create safe and beneficial AI requires a deep understanding of the potential risks and benefits, as well as careful consideration of the impact. We research generative models and how to align them with human values. Our API platform offers our latest models and guides for safety best practices. Developing safe and beneficial AI requires people from a wide range of disciplines and backgrounds. I encourage my team to keep learning. Ideas in different topics or fields can often inspire new ideas and broaden the potential solution space.
